text: The diagram below shows Mug’s Flag ABCDE located in the first quadrant.

Suppose you reflect Flag 1 over the y-axis.

  • What are the coordinates of the images of points A, B, C, D, and E?
  • Write a rule relating coordinates of points ABCDE to their images after a reflection in the y-axis: (x, y) → (■, ■).

Suppose you reflect the Flag 1 over the x-axis.

  • What are the coordinates of the images of points A, B, C, D, and E?
  • Write a rule relating coordinates of points ABCDE to their images after a reflection in the x-axis: (x, y) → (■, ■).

  • Do any points remain unchanged under these reflections? Explain.
